text: Howard Johansen is an American gasser drag racer.Davis, Larry. Gasser Wars (Cartech, 2003), p.180. He won the first ever National Hot Rod Association (NHRA) C/Gas national title, at Great Bend, Kansas, in 1955,.Davis, p.180. == History == Driving a 1955 Chevrolet, Johansen won NHRA's first ever C/Gas national title, at Great Bend, Kansas, in 1955.
